investigationEvent.text: An 81-year-old female patient received Mevalotin (pravastatin sodium) 20mg for hyperlipidemia since July 2008. The patient experienced interstitial pneumonia on 08 October 2008 (inpatient hospitalization).

document.bibliographicDesignationText: K. Kudo, et al. (2009) A Case of Heparin-Induced Thrombocytopenia and Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation during Treatment for Drug-Induced Pneumonia. Journal of Japanese Respiratory Society, The 49th Annual Meeting of The Japanese Respiratory Society, 47: p.316

observationEvent.value: Although the results of DLSTs were all negative, drug-induced pneumonia was most considered from the onset of interstitial pneumonia, the condition of the shadows and the clinical course.

This is a spontaneously received case reported by a literature that is categorized as serious due to inpatient hospitalization. Daiichi Sankyo's assessment of the causal relationship between interstitial pneumonia and Mevalotin is related.
DLSTの結果は陰性であるが間質性肺炎の発症時期、陰影の性状、経過からも薬剤性肺炎が最も考えられる。原因薬剤は特定できていない。
